ActNational Defence Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of BONITA LAINE THORNTON, part-time member of the Military Police Complaints Commission, for the period she is acting as Chairperson, effective October 5, 2021, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Chairperson.
